scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary, adorned with a blue mantle and a golden halo, cradling the Christ Child. To the right, a tonsured monk, wearing a white habit and a golden halo, clasps his hands in prayer, holding a staff. The background is a rich gold, suggesting a divine or spiritual setting, with red and blue drapery behind the figures. The entire scene is framed by an ornate, gilded architectural border with decorative elements.
scene_interpretation: Madonna and Child with a Devotee
